command: [ "$(sha256sum /mnt/flash/system.img | awk '{print $1}')" = "$(sha256sum /var/backups/system.img | awk '{print $1}')" ] || echo 'system image checksum mismatch: modified'
explanation: Compares the active image's checksum to a baseline to detect unauthorized modifications.
rationale_steps: Compute hashes for active and baseline images.
Alert if hashes differ, indicating the system image has been altered.
